We are

Aurajoki Overflow is a tech meetup focused on all of the nooks and crannies of working in software.

We organize events and workshops for software professionals

Meetups

Aurajoki Overflow meetups are a monthly events where we get together and discuss a common topic.

Topics

Each meetup will host 1 main subject with 2-3 presentation on varying variations on the topic.

e.g. A Code Editor themed meetup might host talks on vim & emacs

Not just presentations

The meetups are the perfect place to find likeminded peers and maybe even hold a lightning talk

Hosting an event

For companies, hosting the meetup works as a perfect opportunity to get dozens of professionals to your offices and show them that you care about the local tech culture.

The only thing you will be in charge of is providing the meetup a proper space: A space with a presentation setup/tv and room for the audience, as well as some food and drinks for the attendees to enjoy while they learn. That's it. We will handle the rest: The marketing, registrations, speakers etc.

Ask about organizing an event

Upcoming events

Stay tuned for upcoming community events hosted by Aurajoki Overflow.

Become a speaker

Got a subject you're really passionate about? Have some new technology or method you want to show to all of the World (or at least Turku)?

Submit your proposal for a talk, and we'll figure out a meetup to fit your subject into! It's okay if the your talk isn't 100% complete yet, we can help you with ideas.

Submit a talk

The team

Matias Huhta

Join the community

FAQ

What is Aurajoki Overflow

Aurajoki Overflow is a non-profit group of tech enthusiasts hosting events in the Turku area.

So what exactly is the event structure?

Each of the monthly meetups will revolve around a single topic. One month we might discuss Continuous Delivery, the next we might be talking about Static Site Generators.

Each meetup will then host 2-3 presentations (and possible lightning talks) revolving around that meetups topic.

How can I get in contact with you?

You can contact us via email at aurajoki.overflow@gmail.com

When is the next event going to be held?

Keep an close eye on our socials and groups. We will inform about upcoming events there! The first meetup is planned to be held in Autumn 2022.

Can I attend an event even though I'm not yet a professional, but e.g. a student?

Of course! Aurajoki Overflow is for anyone interested in tech.
